HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: €3.00 for orders below €20.00. Free for orders of €20.00 and more.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1-3 working days, after the order is prepared (preparation takes 24-72 business hours)

express_delivery.delivery_time: 1-3 working days, after the order is prepared
express_delivery.pricing: Free for orders of €20.00 and more, €3.00 for orders below €20.00

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Free delivery to the selected parcel machine

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The website offers two delivery methods for Croatia: Home Delivery via GLS and Parcel Locker delivery via BOX NOW. 
PRICING: GLS home delivery costs €3.00 for orders under €20.00 and is free for orders of €20.00 and above. BOX NOW parcel locker delivery is always free. 
DELIVERY TIME: Orders are prepared within 24-72 business hours. After preparation, GLS delivery takes 1-3 working days. The delivery time for BOX NOW is not specified. 
RESTRICTIONS: There is no information available regarding weekend delivery, surcharges for island delivery, or cash on delivery options. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website offers free delivery for relatively low order values, both for home delivery (€20) and parcel lockers (always free). 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated page. It covers pricing and delivery times for the primary courier (GLS) well. However, details are missing for the BOX NOW service, and there is no mention of common options like COD or specific policies for island deliveries.
